did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: North American Indian art : ephemeral publications about individual artists; also including some original artwork,

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: Stanford University. Libraries. Dept. of Special Collections and University Archives.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: Property rights reside with the repository. Literary rights reside with the creators of the documents or their heirs. To obtain permission to publish or reproduce, please contact the Public Services Librarian of the Dept. of Special Collections.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation:
prefercite.p: [Identification of item] North American Indian art : ephemeral publications about individual artists; also including some original artwork, M0977, Dept. of Special Collections, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, Calif.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Areas represented include Canada, the Great Plains, East (U.S.), West (U.S.), and New Southwest.
